description.value:
Activate A (concentrate)

Leafy stalks protrude from the shaft of this rustic arrow. When an activated vine arrow hits a target, the arrow's shaft splits and grows, wrapping the target in vines.

The target takes a â€“10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for [[/r 2d4]] rounds, or until it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Escape]{Escapes} against a DC of 19. On a critical hit, the target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Immobilized] until it Escapes.
